info.title: The court extended the arrest to the Chief of Ufim y/d of the Oleg Migunu station
Bashkiria ' s debts for the year reached 29 per cent of its own income
The average cost of the housing quadrant in Bashkiria will rise to 99,000.
Bashkiria ' s foreign trade with Tunisia has increased 36 times a year.
BMK was unable to appeal the payment of у44 million to the Pentagon supplier
The Alga card will be switched to another bank after the withdrawal of the licence from QIWI Bank.
Bashkiria exports doubled early in the year
The number of pensioners in Bashkiria decreased by 20,000
Federal business support in Bashkiria increased by 9 per cent
In Bashkiria, grants to young scholars will be increased by a third
Bashkiria trade with OAE increased 5.4 times in 2023
Zachaldine: two Bashkiria fighters are held captive by the U.S.
The Prosecutor ' s Office has confirmed the charge of the " golden hysnic " from Ufy
The Court allowed Dom RF to resume the sale of a 95 million Ufa forest site
In Bashkiria, the agrarians were released from a single farm for a further three years.
Fourteen companies from Bashkiria were included in the Black List for the year
Bashkiria employers ' compensation for labour protection increased by 6 per cent
Bashkiravtodor requested that debt be deferred to о1 billion
Communist site in Ufa for ток99 million will repair the Dortransstroy
Renovation of the Reservoir in Sibai can be completed in 2027
